title: Feminine Symbolism in Christian Art | Seattle Talk
description:
The imagery of the Mother of God is explored, its development in the history of the Church and how it relates to understanding the symbolic patterns of reality,

This talk was given at St-John's Catholic Church in Montesano, Seattle.  

Anomalist Design: https://www.anomalistdesign.com/

My links:  
patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
paypal: https://www.paypal.me/JonathanPageau

website: http://www.thesymbolicworld.com
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/jonathanpageau
twitter: https://twitter.com/pageaujonathan
